products.title: Racing Green Aluminium Venetian
products.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

products.title: Roma, Lime - Vertical Blind
products.description: Put simply, the roma lime couldn't be livelier or more refreshing if it tried. Whilst it retains the smooth, tightly woven fabric so typical of the roma range, its bright green shade is much wilder, adding a vibrant colour pop wherever it's placed. Squirt some fruity fun into your kitchen by hanging the lime as a vibrant window feature, coupled with white and light wood accents. Or go for an all-out citrus colour scheme by combining this blind with white walls and orange and lemon accents.

products.title: Vitra Blackout Sea Green 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: This sea green vitra blackout vertical blind adds a fresh splash of colour to your home, whilst blocking the light. Value for money and made from high-quality polyester-based fabric, your new green vertical blind is perfect for office, bedroom and living rooms. At swift direct blinds, not only is is this saturated, green vertical blind hand made to your measurements, by their expert team, it also comes with a free five year guarantee.

products.description: This lime green blackout vertical blind adds a invigorating splash of colour to your home, whilst blocking the light. products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Pistachio Shell Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: With a chic, contemporary look, the ecowood deluxe's pistachio shell fine grain features a pale biscuit, grainy textured faux wood, which easily forms wide, adjustable slats built for ease and speed. Matching fixtures are displayed alongside them, including designer ladder ribbons for ultimate style. Build a colourful and vibrant atmosphere in the hallway, placing the pistachio shell fine grain amidst a bold coral feature wall and white walls to compliment.

products.title: Isla Pvc Blackout Aloe Green Roller Blind
products.description: Isla pvc blackout aloe green double-sided roller blind features a soft wash of calming blue, instantly transporting you to the long, hot days of summer. With a textured leafy design, its ideal for adding a gentle splash colour to a serene room. The blackout fabric will keep light away when you want to shut the world out and its flame retardant too for extra safety. Isla pvc blackout aloe green is made of moisture resistant fabric, so it's extremely easy to keep it clean.

products.title: Voile Fr Sage Green 127mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Voile fr sage green is a semi-translucent stylish, mint green 127mm vertical blind and is great for freshening up the look of any room. Their voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. A busy kitchen or living room will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in green. Flame retardant and pollergen-coated, makes this sheer vertical a fantastic addition to your living space.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Pistachio Shell Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: When it comes to neutrals, there's no beating the soft grey-toned beige of the pistachio shell satin. Hailing from the ecowood deluxe range, this blind comes complete with linen backing ribbon and matching coordinates for a sleek and streamline look. Tone down a rich red feature wall in your living room or dining room by adding the pistachio shell satin to the scheme. Accent with accessories and ornaments in matching cream tones and the occasional splash of red here and there.

products.title: Amor Electric Lime Roller Blind
products.description: The green colour of the amor electric lime is best suited to rooms with neutral tones so as to make the most of this colour. Ideal places for this colour blind would be in the kitchen or in a child's room. As a blackout blind you this is idea for bedrooms to remove streetlight glare and early morning sunshine. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.description: If you're looking for an explosion of natural colour that you'll fall in love with the moment you see it, look no further than the free-flowing colour that is origin (blackout) in lime.
